p.k: The Detour is an all-too-honest look at the family dynamic starring Jason Jones, Natalie Zea, Ashley Gerasimovich and Liam Carroll. Season four finds the wildly dysfunctional Parker family on an epic worldwide search for their runaway teen daughter. From Tibet to Paraguay and everywhere in between, the Parkers will stop at nothing to get their baby girl back â€“ and piss off everyone in the process.
